title: Resetting all key bindings
body:
I tried a guide that involved changing settings in my input.ini file. Turns out I'm not fond of them so ive been trying to change them back to default..
Unsuccessfully that is.

Ive tried many tips online about deleting the file, or the persistentsettings file and nothing seems to work, any advice?

Have also been through repair tool

replies.body:
Hey there,

Your settings are saved to the server. To reset them follow the steps below.

1. Log into your game client.
2. Delete the games config folder, including persistedsettings.json and input.INI
3. Launch a custom game, confirm settings are set to defaults.
4. Exit the game, your settings will then sync to the server.

Hope this helps.

Ah I see, trick is to leave the client open while you do it

Worked, thanks!
